mapper.insert: INSERT INTO insurant (insurantId, customerId, name, address, phoneNumber, age, accidentHistory, postedPriceOfStructure, usageOfStructure, gender, job, typeOfCar, rankOfCar, riskOfTripCountry, familyMedicalDisease, familyMedicalRelationship) VALUES (#{insurantId}, #{customerId}, #{name}, #{address}, #{phoneNumber}, #{age}, #{accidentHistory}, #{postedPriceOfStructure}, #{usageOfStructure}, #{gender}, #{job}, #{typeOfCar}, #{rankOfCar}, #{riskOfTripCountry}, #{familyMedicalDisease}, #{familyMedicalRelationship})
mapper.select: SELECT customerId FROM insurant WHERE insurantId = #{insurantId}
